body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting CarMart customer support. My name is Benjamin Foster. May I kindly ask for your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Benjamin, my name is Kelly Stewart.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Kelly. Can you provide me with your phone number so we may contact you in case we need to provide further assistance?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five six zero one two three.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And could you also share your email address with us for record purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email address is kelly dot stewart at example dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing your contact information, Kelly. Is there anything else you'd like to inquire about today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Kelly. Thank you for reaching out to us. If you have any more questions in the future, feel free to contact us. Have a great day!
